name: @mlightcad/libredwg-web
description: a webassembly version of libredwg, which can read/write DXF files (in both formats, ascii and binary form) and read DWG files from AutoCAD R14 to AutoCAD 2020.
author: MLight Lee <mlight.lee@outlook.com>

scripts.build:wasm: cd build-wasm && emcc ../src/bindings.cpp -O2 -s LINKABLE=1 -lembind -std=c++11 -Isrc -I../include src/*.o -o libredwg-web.js -s ALLOW_MEMORY_GROWTH=1 -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME="createModule"
scripts.prepare: mkdir -p build && cd build && emconfigure ../configure && cd src
